name: Flatworld
description:
Explore Flatworld making your way using magic from multiple characters to solve puzzles, defeat your enemies and discover secrets in an adventure where there is no need to be strong to win.

Story


A company from the Earth accidentally discovers Flatworld, a parallel world, and finds on it a business opportunity of dubious legality. Furthermore the main character's parents belong to that company. Will someone succeed to end this?

Features


  • Cities with their shops, inns and other points of interest.
  • Multiple playable characters with their unique abilities.
  • Use of magic to solve puzzles, make your way and defeat your enemies.
  • Dungeons full of puzzles, dangers and monsters.
  • Story divided into different arcs the same way Anime series do.
  • Equipable medals to get upgrades.
